mapper.sql: id AS "id", serial_number AS "serialNumber", user_name AS "userName", work_team AS "workTeam", job_responsibility AS "jobResponsibility", id_info AS "idInfo", user_type AS "userType", data_state AS "dataState", create_time AS "createTime",u_pwd AS uPwd, accountcode As "accountcode",emailaddress As "emailaddress",classofpositions As "classofpositions",fawclaofpos As "fawclaofpos",directorid As "directorid",directorname As "directorname",objectstatus As "objectstatus",mdmtype As "mdmtype",deptlevel As "deptlevel",phonenumber As "phoneNumber"
mapper.select:
select
from wms_user where 1 = 1
and id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.id},'%')
and serial_number like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.serialNumber},'%')
and user_name like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.userName},'%')
and work_team like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.workTeam},'%')
and job_responsibility like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.jobResponsibility},'%')
and id_info like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.idInfo},'%')
and user_type like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.userType},'%')
and data_state like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.dataState},'%')
and create_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.createTime},'%')

select
from wms_user where 1 = 1
and id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.id},'%')
and serial_number like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.serialNumber},'%')
and user_name like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.userName},'%')
and work_team like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.workTeam},'%')
and job_responsibility like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.jobResponsibility},'%')
and id_info like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.idInfo},'%')
and user_type like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.userType},'%')
and data_state like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.dataState},'%')
and create_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.createTime},'%')

select , ( case user_type when "A" then "管理员" when "B" then "装备技术室维修人员" when "D" then "车间维修人员" else "操作员" end ) userTypeEx from wms_user where 1 = 1
and id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.id},'%')
and serial_number like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.serialNumber},'%')
and user_name like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.userName},'%')
and work_team like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.workTeam},'%')
and job_responsibility like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.jobResponsibility},'%')
and id_info like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.idInfo},'%')
and user_type like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.userType},'%')
and objectstatus like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.objectstatus},'%')

select
from wms_user where 1 = 1
and id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.id},'%')
and serial_number like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.serialNumber},'%')
and user_name like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.userName},'%')
and work_team like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.workTeam},'%')
and job_responsibility like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.jobResponsibility},'%')
and id_info like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.idInfo},'%')
and user_type like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.userType},'%')
and data_state like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.dataState},'%')
and create_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.createTime},'%')

select id as id, user_name AS userName, serial_number AS serialNumber, id_info AS idInfo, CASE user_type WHEN 'A' THEN '管理人员' WHEN 'B' THEN '装备技术室维修人员' WHEN 'D' THEN '车间维修人员' ELSE '操作人员' END AS userTypeEx, user_type AS userType from wms_user where serial_number = #{number} and u_pwd = #{pwd} and data_state = 0

select id as id, user_name AS userName, serial_number AS serialNumber, id_info AS idInfo, CASE user_type WHEN 'A' THEN '管理人员' WHEN 'B' THEN '装备技术室维修人员' WHEN 'D' THEN '车间维修人员' ELSE '操作人员' END AS userTypeEx, user_type AS userType from wms_user where serial_number = #{number} and u_pwd = #{pwd} and data_state = 0 and user_type in ('A','C')

select id as id, user_name AS userName, serial_number AS serialNumber, id_info AS idInfo, CASE user_type WHEN 'A' THEN '管理人员' WHEN 'B' THEN '装备技术室维修人员' WHEN 'D' THEN '车间维修人员' ELSE '操作人员' END AS userTypeEx, user_type AS userType from wms_user where id_info = #{staffId} and data_state = 0

select id as id, user_name AS userName, serial_number AS serialNumber, id_info AS idInfo, CASE user_type WHEN 'A' THEN '管理人员' WHEN 'B' THEN '装备技术室维修人员' WHEN 'D' THEN '车间维修人员' ELSE '操作人员' END AS userTypeEx, user_type AS userType from wms_user where id_info = #{staffId} and data_state = 0 and user_type in ('A','C')

select id AS "id", serial_number AS "serialNumber", user_name AS "userName", work_team AS "workTeam", job_responsibility AS "jobResponsibility", id_info AS "idInfo", user_type AS "userType", data_state AS "dataState", create_time AS "createTime",u_pwd AS uPwd, accountcode As "accountcode",emailaddress As "emailaddress",classofpositions As "classofpositions",fawclaofpos As "fawclaofpos",directorid As "directorid",directorname As "directorname",objectstatus As "objectstatus",mdmtype As "mdmtype",deptlevel As "deptlevel" from wms_user where work_team = #{Selectitem} AND (job_responsibility="班长" or job_responsibility="班长负责人" OR job_responsibility="作业长" OR job_responsibility="作业长负责人")

select id AS "id", serial_number AS "serialNumber", user_name AS "userName", work_team AS "workTeam", job_responsibility AS "jobResponsibility", id_info AS "idInfo", user_type AS "userType", data_state AS "dataState", create_time AS "createTime",u_pwd AS uPwd, accountcode As "accountcode",emailaddress As "emailaddress",classofpositions As "classofpositions",fawclaofpos As "fawclaofpos",directorid As "directorid",directorname As "directorname",objectstatus As "objectstatus",mdmtype As "mdmtype",deptlevel As "deptlevel" from wms_user where user_name = #{Selectname} AND data_state=0 AND objectstatus="Active"

select id AS "id", serial_number AS "serialNumber", user_name AS "userName", work_team AS "workTeam", job_responsibility AS "jobResponsibility", id_info AS "idInfo", user_type AS "userType", data_state AS "dataState", create_time AS "createTime",u_pwd AS uPwd, accountcode As "accountcode",emailaddress As "emailaddress",classofpositions As "classofpositions",fawclaofpos As "fawclaofpos",directorid As "directorid",directorname As "directorname",objectstatus As "objectstatus",mdmtype As "mdmtype",deptlevel As "deptlevel" from wms_user where serial_number = #{SerialNumber} AND data_state=0 AND objectstatus="Active"
